snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes adjusting to Facebook's acquisition of Instagram, exporting your photos from Instagram, and how Amazon marketed...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes adjusting to Facebook's acquisition of Instagram, exporting your photos from Instagram, and how Amazon marketed itself on Tumblr.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Instagram's Direction, and Amazon on Tumblr
